AppPush.Title: [EN] HoYoPlay API Migration Notice
AppPush.Message:
Heyya Collapse users!
We have updated some game APIs to the new HoYoPlay API. The API update is currently applied for Genshin Impact (Glb/CN), Honkai Impact 3rd (CN) and Honkai: Star Rail (Glb/CN), for all mechanisms (updates, preloads, initial install and launcher assets). Please make sure you're on latest Collapse version (1.80.9+) to prevent any issues. Should you encounter any, please inform us via Discord or in the GitHub discussion thread below.
